function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of coordinated multi-sectoral actions to mitigate public health crisis impact","Impact":"Ineffective control of the public health crisis, leading to increased spread of contagious diseases and higher mortality rates","Mitigation":"Establishing collaborative frameworks for public-private-civil society sector involvement, improving communication and information exchange, and developing coordinated response plans","Technologies":"Collaborative platforms, communication tools, data sharing and analysis technology","People":"Policy-makers, researchers, practitioners, civil society organizations, public","Owner":"Governments, public health organizations, private sector"}]}
